card.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
card.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

card.name: Battle Ox
card.description: A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

card.name: Koumori Dragon
card.description: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.

card.name: Rogue Doll
card.description: A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.

card.name: Kojikocy
card.description: A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders.

card.name: Uraby
card.description: Fast on its feet, this dinosaur rips enemies to shreds with its sharp claws.

card.name: Mystic Horseman
card.description: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.

card.name: Ryu-Kishin Powered
card.description: A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.

card.name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
card.description: A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.

card.name: Skull Red Bird
card.description: This monster swoops down and attacks with a rain of knives stored in its wings.

card.name: Hyozanryu
card.description: A dragon created from a massibe diamond that sparkles with blinding light.

card.name: Opticlops
card.description: A one-eyed giant that serves the "Dark Ruler Ha Des", it skewers its enemies with its sharp horn, shattering them to pieces.

card.name: The Dragon Dwelling in the Cave
card.description: A huge dragon dwelling in a cave. It is horrible when it gets angry, although it is usually quiet. It is said to preserve certain treasures.

card.name: Luster Dragon #2
card.description: This dragon feeds on emerald. Enchanted by this monster even when attacked, few people live to tell of its beauty.

card.name: Kaiser Sea Horse
card.description: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a LIGHT monster.

card.name: Lord of D.
card.description: Neither player can target Dragon monsters on the field with card effects.

card.name: Mysterious Puppeteer
card.description: Each time you or your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster, increase your Life Points by 500 points.

card.name: Trap Master
card.description: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

card.name: Hane-Hane
card.description: FLIP: Select 1 monster on the field and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Witch of the Black Forest
card.description: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Witch of the Black Forest" once per turn.

card.name: Mystic Tomato
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Mad Sword Beast
card.description: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

card.name: Spirit Ryu
card.description: During your Battle Step, if this card battles (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Dragon monster to the GY; this card gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of the Battle Phase.

card.name: Paladin of White Dragon
card.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "White Dragon Ritual". If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. You can Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand or your Deck. ("Blue-Eyes White Dragon" cannot attack during that turn.)

card.name: White Dragon Ritual
card.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of White Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 4 or more from the field or your hand.

card.name: Ookazi
card.description: Inflict 800 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

card.name: Fissure
card.description: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

card.name: De-Spell
card.description: Target 1 face-up Spell, or 1 Set Spell/Trap, on the field; destroy that target if it is a Spell. (If the target is Set, reveal it.)

card.name: Monster Reborn
card.description: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

card.name: The Inexperienced Spy
card.description: Select and see 1 card in your opponent's hand.

card.name: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
card.description: Special Summon up to 2 Dragon monsters from your hand. "Lord of D." must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

card.name: Change of Heart
card.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

card.name: Soul Exchange
card.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, if you Tribute a monster, you must Tribute that target, as if you controlled it. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Mountain
card.description: All Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

card.name: Tribute to The Doomed
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

card.name: Rush Recklessly
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

card.name: Megamorph
card.description: While your LP is lower than your opponent's, the equipped monster's ATK becomes double its original ATK. While your LP is higher, the equipped monster's ATK becomes half its original ATK.

card.name: Nobleman of Crossout
card.description: Target 1 face-down monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, banish it, then, if it was a Flip monster, each player reveals their Main Deck, then banishes all cards from it with that monster's name.

card.name: Premature Burial
card.description: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

card.name: Fairy Meteor Crush
card.description: If the equipped monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

card.name: Shadow Spell
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 700 ATK, also it cannot attack or change its battle position. When it leaves the field, destroy this card.

card.name: Trap Hole
card.description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

card.name: Just Desserts
card.description: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

card.name: Gift of The Mystical Elf
card.description: Increase your Life Points by 300 points for each monster on the field.

card.name: Dust Tornado
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

card.name: Light of Intervention
card.description: While this card is on the field, Monster Cards cannot be Set or flipped face-down. If a Monster Card would be Set, it must be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.

card.name: Jar of Greed
card.description: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Riryoku Field
card.description: When a Spell Card that targets exactly 1 monster on the field (and no other cards) is activated: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Burst Breath
card.description: Tribute 1 Dragon-Type monster; destroy all face-up monsters on the field whose DEF is less than or equal to the ATK the Tributed monster had on the field.

card.name: D. Tribe
card.description: All monsters on your side of the field are treated as Dragon-Types until the End Phase of this turn.
